room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by Escape Room 5280 in Longmont
room_description: An eccentric millionaire stepped out for a one hour walk. This is exactly how much time your team has to rob his house! You will find cash, diamonds, gold, paintings… But! There is a problem. The man turned his house into a trap full of puzzles, safes, hidden places, locks and other “surprises”! Only the most creative and organized thieves can rob the house and escape within one hour…
